title: Flower With The Deadly Sting, The, Il Fiore Dai Petali D' Acciaio 1973 Gianni Garko, Carrol Baker, Pila Velazquez, Paola Senatore, Ivano Staccioli, Umberto Raho, Eleonora Morana, Alba Maiolini,

sources.title: Flower With The Deadly Sting The Il Fiore Dai Petali D Acciaio 1973 Gianni Garko
sources.description: A surgeon (it is always a surgeon) accidentally kills his soon to be ex-wife by pushing her over on to a plant sculpture with surprisingly sharp petals. Soon he is being blackmailed. Typical of Italian giallo there are a lot of scenes of people walking around, driving cars, lurking in dark alleys. English subtitles included
